sentences.sContent: There is an active Society which brings to book a good many parents who starve and torture and overwork their children, and intimidates a good many more.
sentences.sCn: 一个很积极的社会记录了许多父母是怎样让自己的孩子忍饥挨饿，折磨他们，让他们过度工作，对他们愈加 恐吓的。

sentences.sContent: I've seen a good many little girls in my time, but never ONE with such a neck as that!
sentences.sCn: 鸽子十分轻蔑地说，“我这辈子看见过许多小姑娘，可从来没有一个长着像你这样的长脖子的！
